title: Diamond Mangalsutra Pendant - "Tejaswi Mangalsutra"
materials: meticulously crafted with brilliant-cut diamonds. The diamonds boast a VVS clarity and are set in a delicate pave setting
accentuating their sparkle. Finished with our signature Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting sheen.
features: This pendant features an elongated crescent shape, a modern interpretation of traditional mangalsutra designs. The oval-shaped motifs are linked with diamond-studded accents, creating a sense of flow and elegance. Dangling diamond clusters add a touch of whimsy and movement. The double-stranded chain connectors ensure a secure and stylish fit.
colors: Rose Gold and Sparkling White Diamonds.
occasions: Perfect for everyday wear as a symbol of commitment. Also suitable for special occasions
description: This exquisite mangalsutra pendant combines contemporary design with the timeless allure of diamonds. It's a versatile piece that can be worn with both traditional and modern outfits. The high-quality materials and meticulous craftsmanship ensure durability and lasting beauty. A testament to your enduring love, 'Tejaswi Mangalsutra' radiates sophistication and grace.
